result.title: Periodic Table Podcast - Hydrogen
result.transcript: In this episode, we explore Hydrogen, the lightest and most abundant element in the universe.

result.title: Periodic Table Podcast - Helium
result.transcript: Discover the fascinating properties of Helium and its vital role in scientific research.

result.title: Periodic Table Podcast - Lithium
result.transcript: This episode delves into Lithium, highlighting its use in batteries and modern technology.

result.title: Periodic Table Podcast - Beryllium
result.transcript: Explore Beryllium and learn why its unique properties make it essential in aerospace applications.

result.title: Periodic Table Podcast - Boron
result.transcript: Join us as we discuss Boron, focusing on its remarkable role in both chemistry and industry.
